name: Snapp
tagline: Smart Mobile Apps for Smart Business
description:
Snapp is an innovative mobile strategy and application development company based in Bath. We provide a full mobile strategy review, giving you an accelerated and expert insight into the implications and opportunities of the mobile channel on your business.
We can assist at all stages of the application development process, from helping to shape and validate a formative idea, all the way through to building and actively selling your application.
Our professional team has the ability to deliver mobile applications on all major platforms including Apple iOS (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch), Android, Blackberry, Symbian, Windows Mobile.
We were one of the first companies in the world to have an iPad specific application on sale for the worldwide launch.
We have many years' experience of delivering technical transformation to blue chip companies e.g. Thomas Cook, Tesco, Lastminute.com, Orange, Diageo and we now bring the full weight of that experience to bear on the mobile applications market.
We work with organisations of all sizes, providing bespoke solutions aligned to your specific needs and budget.
